content: {"name": "QCH Pomonok Community Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "For the first visit you will need to fill out form to get registered,Please bring your id.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.qchnyc.org/locations?location=pomonok", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "67-09 Kissena Blvd", "address_2": "", "city": "Flushing", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "11367", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.735123, "longitude": -73.814186}, "phones": [{"number": "(718) 591-6060", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Number of household members"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Needs volunteers"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must bring own bags/cart"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Will reschedule in case of holiday closures"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Toiletries, if available "}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: Once a week "}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "1 person per household only"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required on site"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Form needs to be filled out with household size "}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "First come, first serve: open until food runs out"}]}
